Container.Requires: *** Requires Tunarr or Dizquetv + Plex or Jellyfin media server. ***

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: Port for accessing the TVx web interface. After installation, access TVx at http://[IP]:[PORT]. Default: 8777

Config.Name: M3U URL
Config.Description: URL to your Tunarr M3U playlist. Replace 'your-tunarr-ip-address' with your actual Tunarr server IP.

Config.Name: XMLTV URL
Config.Description: URL to your Tunarr XMLTV EPG guide. Replace 'your-tunarr-ip-address' with your actual Tunarr server IP.

Config.Name: Appdata
Config.Description: Path for persistent storage of settings, configuration files, and logs (tvx.log). Logs are automatically rotated and saved here.

Config.Name: Timezone
Config.Description: Container timezone for proper EPG time display. Examples: America/New_York, Europe/London, Asia/Tokyo, etc. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_tz_database_time_zones for full list.
